trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows rich text box control.
trans-unit.target: 代表 Windows rtf 文字控制項。

trans-unit.source: With the RichTextBox control, the user can enter and edit text.
trans-unit.target: 與 RichTextBox 控制項中，使用者可以輸入和編輯文字。

trans-unit.source: The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項也提供更進階的格式化功能，比標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file.
trans-unit.target: 文字可以直接指派給控制項，或可以載入從 rtf 格式 (RTF) 或純文字檔。

trans-unit.source: The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting.
trans-unit.target: 字元和段落格式，可以指派內控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: The RichTextBox control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control.
trans-unit.target: RichTextBox 控制項提供許多可用來將格式套用到控制項中文字的任何部分的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的文字格式，您必須先選擇。

trans-unit.source: Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting.
trans-unit.target: 字元和段落格式，可以指派只有選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected.
trans-unit.target: 一旦設定對選取的文字區段，會選取所有文字輸入之後變更設定之前，使用相同的設定也格式化選取項目或控制項的文件的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A> property enables you to make text bold or italic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A>屬性可讓您將文字粗體或斜體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性來變更文字的字體和大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A> property enables you to change the color of the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A>屬性可讓您變更文字的色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create bulleted lists you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立您可以使用的項目符號清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionIndent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionRightIndent%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionHangingIndent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以調整設定格式化的段落<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionIndent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionRightIndent%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionHangingIndent%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionHangingIndent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionRightIndent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionIndent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RichTextBox control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files.
trans-unit.target: RichTextBox 控制項提供方法，提供開啟和儲存檔案的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法可讓您將現有的 RTF 或 ASCII 文字檔案載入控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also load data from an already opened data stream.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以從已開啟的資料流載入資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>可讓您將檔案儲存至 RTF 或 ASCII 文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method, you can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method to save to an open data stream.
trans-unit.target: 類似於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法，您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>方法，將儲存到開啟的資料流。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RichTextBox control also provides features for finding strings of text.
trans-unit.target: RichTextBox 控制項也提供功能來尋找文字字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法是多載來尋找文字的這兩個字串內控制項的文字以及為特定的字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also initialize the RichTextBox control to data stored in memory.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以初始化 RichTextBox 控制項儲存在記憶體中的資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A> property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A>屬性設為包含文字顯示，包括 RTF 碼，以決定應如何格式化文字的字串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A> property to display the link appropriately in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項內的文字包含連結，例如連結至網站，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A>可適當地將連結顯示在控制項中的文字中的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event to perform the tasks associated with the link.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件以執行與連結相關聯的工作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionProtected%2A> property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionProtected%2A>屬性可讓您防止使用者操作的控制項內的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionProtected%2A>

trans-unit.source: With protected text in your control, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Protected> event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text.
trans-unit.target: 與受保護的文字在控制項中，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Protected>事件，以判斷當使用者嘗試修改受保護的文字，並請警告使用者，受保護的文字，或是使用者提供的標準方式來管理受保護的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Protected>

trans-unit.source: Applications that already use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls can easily be adapted to make use of RichTextBox controls.
trans-unit.target: 已使用的應用程式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>可輕鬆地適用於使用 RichTextBox 控制項的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: However, the RichTextBox control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，RichTextBox 控制項沒有相同的 64k 字元容量限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The RichTextBox is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word.
trans-unit.target: RichTextBox 通常用來提供操作文字，並顯示類似於文書處理應用程式，例如 Microsoft Word 的功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method does not work with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法不適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation used in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control when the bullet style is applied to the text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定縮排用於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制的項目符號樣式套用至文字時。

trans-unit.source: To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A> property to `true` and then set the BulletIndent property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented.
trans-unit.target: 若要將項目符號樣式套用至一段文字，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>屬性`true`然後將 BulletIndent 屬性設定為文字應該會縮排的像素數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet.
trans-unit.target: 在一段必須套用至它與指定的項目符號之後的縮排數量的項目符號樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響目前的段落內控制項的文字和項目符號項目清單中目前選取的項目符號。

trans-unit.source: To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the BulletIndent property.
trans-unit.target: 若要將不同的縮排層級套用至整個清單的項目符號項目，則必須選取才能 BulletIndent 屬性設定的項目符號的所有文字。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels inserted as the indentation after a bullet.
trans-unit.target: 插入為項目符號之後的縮排的像素數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零。

trans-unit.source: The specified indentation was less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的縮排小於零。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether there are actions that have occurred within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> that can be reapplied.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否有內發生的動作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> ，可以重新套用。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether the last operation undone in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be reapplied using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否最後一項作業中復原<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>可以使用重新套用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are operations that have been undone that can be reapplied to the content of the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果有已復原的作業，可以重新套用至內容的控制項，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> will automatically format a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) when it is typed into the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>輸入至控制項時，則會自動將會格式化統一資源定位器 (URL)。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, any text entered into the control that is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> to be a URL is automatically formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，取決於控制項中輸入任何文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>是 URL 會自動格式化為連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event to handle all links clicked in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>按一下控制項中的事件，以處理所有的連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs> that is provided to the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event provides data that enables you to determine which link was clicked in the control in order to process the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs>加入事件處理常式提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件提供可讓您判斷哪一個連結已在控制項中按下以處理連結的資料。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> will automatically format URLs that are typed into the control as a link; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>將會自動格式化為連結控制項類型，否則的 Url <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables drag-and-drop operations on text, pictures, and other data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，可讓文字、 圖片及其他資料上的拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable drag-and-drop operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用拖放作業;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control for the first instance of a character from a list of characters.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制字元的字元清單中的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法會搜尋第一個執行個體，從清單中所指定字元的字元`characterSet`參數並傳回字元的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您傳遞字元，其中包含字元 'Q' 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method would return the value of four.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項包含文字"快速 Brown Fox"，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法會傳回四個值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search.
trans-unit.target: 為大寫字母和小寫字元會視為不同的值，在搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的字元是內找不到控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋一組控制項中的字元。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法需要包含控制項中的整個文件會搜尋的字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果從提供的方法中的字元清單的字元`characterSet`找不到參數，這個方法所傳回的值為控制項中的字元位置的以零為起始索引。

trans-unit.source: A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character.
trans-unit.target: 空格會被視為字元方法所決定的字元位置時。

trans-unit.source: The array of characters to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search characters were found or -1 if the search characters are not found or an empty search character set is specified in the char parameter.
trans-unit.target: 已指定的位置找不到搜尋字元，或是-1，如果找不到搜尋字元或空的搜尋字元設定在控制項中位置 char 參數。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control for a string.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋中的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制項的字串。

trans-unit.source: The Find method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character within the control.
trans-unit.target: Find 方法中指定的文字搜尋`str`參數並傳回控制項中的第一個字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的文字字串找不到控制項的內容中。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來建立，可供使用者控制項的搜尋功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個方法來搜尋的文字取代特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the Find method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者控制項中輸入日期，您可以使用 Find 方法搜尋文件中的所有日期，並以適當的格式取代之前使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>控制項的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Find methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 接受的 尋找方法`string`如參數找不到包含在多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>內的文字行的文字

trans-unit.source: Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 執行這類搜尋將傳回負一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: The text to locate in the control.
trans-unit.target: 要在控制項中尋找的文字。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search text was found or -1 if the search string is not found or an empty search string is specified in the str parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中找到搜尋文字的位置或-1，如果找不到搜尋字串或空的搜尋字串中指定 str 參數。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control, at a specific starting point, for the first instance of a character from a list of characters.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制項，在特定的起始點，從清單中的字元字元的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location the character.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法會搜尋第一個執行個體，從清單中所指定字元的字元`characterSet`參數和傳回的字元位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您傳遞字元，其中包含字元 'Q' 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method would return the value of four.

trans-unit.source: An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search.

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋一組控制項中的字元。

trans-unit.source: If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果從提供的方法中的字元清單的字元`characterSet`找不到參數，這個方法所傳回的值為控制項中的字元位置的以零為起始索引。

trans-unit.source: A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character.
trans-unit.target: 空格會被視為字元方法所決定的字元位置時。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method enables you to search for a character set from a specified start position within the text of the control by specifying a value for the `start` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法可讓您搜尋所指定的值從控制項文字內指定的開始位置設定字元`start`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of zero indicates that the search should start from the beginning of the control's document.
trans-unit.target: 零表示搜尋應該從控制項的文件的開頭開始。

trans-unit.source: You can use this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to narrow your search to avoid text that you already know does not contain the specified characters you are searching for or are not important in your search.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，以縮小搜尋範圍，以避免您已了解的文字不包含您要搜尋或並不重要，在搜尋中指定的字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: The array of characters to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control's text at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 要開始搜尋控制項文字內的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search characters are found.
trans-unit.target: 控制項內找到搜尋字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control for a string with specific options applied to the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋中的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>使用特定的選項套用至搜尋字串的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法會搜尋中指定的文字`str`參數並傳回控制項中的第一個字元的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的文字字串找不到控制項的內容中。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來建立，可供使用者控制項的搜尋功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個方法來搜尋的文字取代特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者控制項中輸入日期，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜尋文件中的所有日期，並以適當的格式取代之前使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>控制項的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: With this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search.
trans-unit.target: 與此版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，您可以指定選項，可讓您展開或縮小搜尋範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定可讓您以符合大小寫的搜尋文字，或整個文字，而不是部分文字搜尋選項。

trans-unit.source: By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的列舉`options`參數，您可以搜尋文件底部到頂端，而不是預設頂端到底部搜尋方法的文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法接受`string`參數找不到包含在多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>內的文字行的文字為</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.target: 執行這類搜尋將傳回負一 (-1)。

trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search text was found.

trans-unit.target: 搜尋某範圍的文字中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制字元的字元清單中的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method enables you to search for a character set from a range of text in the control by specifying a value for the `start` and `end` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法可讓您搜尋所指定的值從控制項中的文字範圍的設定字元`start`和`end`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of zero for the `start` parameter indicates that the search should start from the beginning of the control's document.
trans-unit.target: 的值為零`start`參數表示搜尋應該從控制項的文件的開頭開始。

trans-unit.source: A -1 value for the `end` parameter indicates that the search should end at the end of the text within the control.

trans-unit.source: You can use this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to narrow your search to a specific range of text within the control to avoid searching areas of the document that are not important to the needs of your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，以縮小搜尋範圍，以特定範圍的控制項，以避免搜尋文件不是重要的應用程式需求的區域內的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個方法來搜尋的文字取代特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者控制項中輸入日期，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜尋文件中的所有日期，並以適當的格式取代之前使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>控制項的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: With this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search.
trans-unit.target: 與此版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，您可以指定選項，可讓您展開或縮小搜尋範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定可讓您以符合大小寫的搜尋文字，或整個文字，而不是部分文字搜尋選項。

trans-unit.source: By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的列舉`options`參數，您可以搜尋文件底部到頂端，而不是預設頂端到底部搜尋方法的文字。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific starting position within the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法也可讓您選取特定控制項的文字內開始位置來縮小搜尋的文字範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: This feature can enable you to avoid text that might have already been searched or where the specific text you are searching for is known not to exist.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能可讓您避免使用文字，可能已經被搜尋，或在其中指定您要搜尋的文字已知不存在。

trans-unit.source: When the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` value is specified in the `options` parameter, the value of the `start` parameter indicates the position where the reverse search will end since the search will start at the bottom of the document when using this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`該值會以指定`options`參數、 值`start`參數表示的位置，因為文件的底部會開始搜尋 時使用這個版本的反向搜尋將會結束的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法接受`string`參數找不到包含在多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>內的文字行的文字為</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 執行這類搜尋將傳回負一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: The text to locate in the control.
trans-unit.target: 要在控制項中尋找的文字。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control's text at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 要開始搜尋控制項文字內的位置。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search text was found.
trans-unit.target: 控制項內找到搜尋文字的位置。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control for a string within a range of text within the control and with specific options applied to the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋中的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制文字在控制項中，並使用特定的選項套用至搜尋的範圍內的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search string within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法會搜尋中指定的文字`str`參數，並傳回控制項中的字串搜尋的第一個字元的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的文字字串找不到控制項的內容中。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來建立，可供使用者控制項的搜尋功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個方法來搜尋的文字取代特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者控制項中輸入日期，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜尋文件中的所有日期，並以適當的格式取代之前使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>控制項的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: With this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search.
trans-unit.target: 與此版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，您可以指定選項，可讓您展開或縮小搜尋範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定可讓您以符合大小寫的搜尋文字，或整個文字，而不是部分文字搜尋選項。

trans-unit.source: By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的列舉`options`參數，您可以搜尋文件底部到頂端，而不是預設頂端到底部搜尋方法的文字。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific start and end position within the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法也可讓您選取特定的開始和結束位置的控制項文字內縮小搜尋的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: This feature can enable you to limit the search range to a specific section of the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能可讓您限制搜尋範圍到特定的控制項的文字區段。

trans-unit.source: If a value of negative one (-1) is assigned to the `end` parameter, the method will search until the end of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> for normal searches.
trans-unit.target: 如果負一 (-1) 指派給`end`參數，該方法會搜尋中的文字的結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>一般搜尋。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For reverse searches, a value of negative one (-1) assigned to the `end` parameter indicates that text will be searched from the end of text (bottom) to the position defined by `start` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 反向搜尋的值的負一 (-1) 指派給`end`參數會指出文字搜尋的文字 （下方） 的結尾時所定義的位置`start`參數。

trans-unit.source: When the `start` and `end` parameters are provided the same value the entire control is searched for normal searches.
trans-unit.target: 當`start`和`end`參數會提供一般搜尋會搜尋整個控制項的相同值。

trans-unit.source: For a reverse search, the entire control is searched but the search begins at the bottom of the document and searches to the top of the document.
trans-unit.target: 反向搜尋，會搜尋整個控制項，但搜尋開始於文件的底部，然後搜尋至文件的頂端。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法接受`string`參數找不到包含在多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>內的文字行的文字為</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 執行這類搜尋將傳回負一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: The text to locate in the control.
trans-unit.target: 要在控制項中尋找的文字。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control's text at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 要開始搜尋控制項文字內的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control's text at which to end searching.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的文字中要搜尋的結束位置。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to negative one (-1) or greater than or equal to the `start` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此值必須等於負一 (-1) 或大於或等於`start`參數。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search text was found.
trans-unit.target: 控制項內找到搜尋文字的位置。

trans-unit.source: The str parameter was .
trans-unit.target: The str parameter was .

trans-unit.source: The end parameter was less the start parameter.
trans-unit.target: end 參數為小於 start 參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項所顯示之文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>来套用至控制項所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the character nearest to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 擷取最接近指定位置的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回最接近指定位置的字元索引`pt`參數。

trans-unit.source: The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces.
trans-unit.target: 字元索引為起始的索引中的控制項，包括空格的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞至這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是如果您想要執行的工作，使用者將滑鼠指標置於控制項的文字中的字時很有用。

trans-unit.source: The location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置以零為起始的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the line number from the specified character position within the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的字元位置的文字中擷取的行號<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷在指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The first line of text in the control returns the value zero.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。

trans-unit.source: The GetLineFromCharIndex method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control.
trans-unit.target: GetLineFromCharIndex 方法會傳回實體的行號索引的字元所在控制項中。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the GetLineFromCharIndex method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行的控制項中文字的一部分會包裝至下一行，GetLineFromCharIndex 方法會傳回 1 如果第二個實體的行換行字元的指定的索引處的字元。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>設`false`、 行的任何部分換行至下一步，而且方法會傳回 0，表示指定的字元索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪一行特定的字元索引位於內。

trans-unit.source: For example, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法來搜尋的文字，您可以取得找到的搜尋結果的字元索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method with the character index returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to determine which line the word was found.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>找不到方法，以判斷這行文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: In certain cases, GetLineFromCharIndex does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，GetLineFromCharIndex 不會擲回例外狀況時`index`參數是無效的值。

trans-unit.source: For example: - If the `index` parameter is <xref:System.Int32.MinValue> or -1, GetLineFromCharIndex returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 例如:-如果`index`參數是<xref:System.Int32.MinValue>則為-1，GetLineFromCharIndex 傳回 0。</xref:System.Int32.MinValue>

trans-unit.source: - If the `index` parameter is the text length or <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>, GetLineFromCharIndex returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -如果`index`參數是文字長度或<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>，GetLineFromCharIndex 傳回的最後一行文字，不一定是相同的數目為`Lines.Length-1`上的值，取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> </xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, validate the input before calling GetLineFromCharIndex.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，請呼叫 GetLineFromCharIndex 之前驗證輸入。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中指定的字元索引`index`參數超出可用的控制項中包含的行數，會傳回最後一個行號。

trans-unit.source: The character index position to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字元索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based line number in which the character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 中的字元索引所在的以零為起始的行號。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the location within the control at the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定之字元索引控制項內的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷在控制項中特定的字元索引所在位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法針對在控制項中顯示快顯功能表項目或說明資訊 word 等工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要向使用者顯示選項功能表，當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下控制項中文字時，可以使用此方法判斷才能正確顯示文字的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The index of the character for which to retrieve the location.
trans-unit.target: 這是要擷取其位置的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: The location of the specified character.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the horizontal scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下控制項的水平捲軸時。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user switches input methods on an Asian version of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者在亞洲版 Windows 作業系統上切換輸入的法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> settings for Input Method Editor (IME) and Asian language support.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>輸入法 (IME) 和亞洲語言支援的設定。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks on a link within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下控制項文字內的連結。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立處理連結已經在控制項中按下此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件處理常式所提供的資訊，您可以判斷哪一個連結已按下文件中。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > By default, links are displayed as text and are not clickable.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 根據預設，連結會顯示為文字和不可點選。

trans-unit.source: To make them clickable set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使其可點按組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Loads a rich text format (RTF) or standard ASCII text file into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rtf 格式 (RTF) 或標準 ASCII 文字檔案載入<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When loading a file with the LoadFile method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 正在載入檔案的內容時使用 LoadFile 方法載入檔案，取代的整個內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: This will cause the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A> properties to change.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A>屬性來變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法將先前建立的文字或 RTF 文件載入操作的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save the file, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存檔案，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > With this version of the LoadFile method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > LoadFile 方法的這個版本，如果所載入的檔案不是 RTF 文件中，會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType> enumeration as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要載入不同類型的檔案，例如 ASCII 文字檔案，請使用 接受的值，這個方法的其他版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType>做為參數的列舉。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The LoadFile method will not open a file until a handle is created for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > LoadFile 方法將不會開啟檔案控制代碼建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>之前

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the LoadFile method.
trans-unit.target: 請確定已建立的控制項控點，再呼叫 LoadFile 方法。

trans-unit.source: The data that is loaded into the control replaces the entire contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料載入至控制項的整個內容取代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to load a file that has been previously opened into a data stream into the control for manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法將已開啟的檔案載入資料流操作的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save contents of the control back into the stream, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method that accepts a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將控制項的內容儲存回資料流，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>方法可接受<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件做為參數。</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method also enables you to specify the type of data that is being loaded into the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法也可讓您指定的正被載入控制項的資料類型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the rich text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的使用者能夠輸入或貼入 rtf 文字控制項的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為 0 時，您可以輸入控制項中文字的最大長度為 64 KB 的字元。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常是使用當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>用來顯示單行文字 rtf 文字格式 (RTF)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，或限制的輸入資料時資料庫中輸入的文字長度來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼、 文字的長度。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制的最大長度，在資料庫中對應欄位的輸入控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中的程式碼，您可以設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性值的長度大於所指定的值，這個值以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property only affects text entered into the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響執行階段輸入控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入控制項的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSelectionChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元已由控制項處理否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者嘗試修改控制項中保護的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has attempted to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立此事件的事件處理常式，在您的應用程式，以判斷當使用者嘗試修改已標示為受保護控制項中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is attempting to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text.
trans-unit.target: 可以用事件處理常式，以通知受保護的文字使用者正嘗試修改的使用者或顯示對話方塊，讓使用者可以進行適當的變更的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to choose a date which can then be applied to the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果受保護的區域是日期，您可以顯示對話方塊，讓使用者選擇日期，並接著可套用至控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Reapplies the last operation that was undone in the control.
trans-unit.target: 重新套用已在控制項中復原的上一個作業。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the Redo method to reapply the last undo operation to the control.
trans-unit.target: 重做方法然後可用來重新套用控制項在前一個復原操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A> method enables you to determine whether the last operation the user has undone can be reapplied to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A>方法可讓您判斷是否已在復原使用者最後一項作業可以重新套用到控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the action that can be reapplied to the control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 取得可以重新套用至控制項的動作名稱時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo*>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo*>

trans-unit.source: If this property returns an empty string (""), there is no operation available to reapply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性會傳回空字串 ("")，就可以再套用到控制項沒有作業。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the last action undone in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control that can then be reapplied to the control when a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A> method is made.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷復原中的最後一個動作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項，然後被重新套用到控制項時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A>方法由。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether there are any operations to be reapplied to the control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷是否有任何作業，重新套用至控制項使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the action that will be performed when a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo*> method is made.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示呼叫時將執行的動作名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo*>方法由。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo*>

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。
